params.poolIdentifier: The string identifier to associate with the corresponding pool hash

params.position: The address of the position manager contract

SetPoolIdentifier(string,bytes32).notice: Emitted after the string identifier of a pool has been set

getPoolIdentifier(bytes32).notice: Get the pool identifier corresponding to the input pool hash

setPoolIdentifier(string,bytes32).notice: Set the pool string identifier corresponding to the input pool hash

tokenURI(address,uint128).notice: Returns the encoded svg for positions artwork
